alert.note: Alert for Tulsa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 24 at 8:40PM CDT until May 26 at 9:34AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Bird Creek at Avant affecting Osage County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Bird Creek near Sperry affecting Osage and Tulsa Counties. Bird Creek near Owasso-Mingo affecting Tulsa County. Caney River near Collinsville affecting Tulsa and Rogers Counties. Caney River near Ramona affecting Washington OK County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING TO LATE THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bird Creek near Owasso-Mingo. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning to late Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, minor flooding occurs at Mohawk Park and along 56th Street North near Mingo Road. At 19.0 feet, minor flooding occurs near Mohawk Park. 56th Street North may be impassable near Mingo Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 16.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 18.5 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
